posts.post_content: Cenelder, I'm pretty new to MTG but this card says +1/+1 whenever you draw a card. Cascade says "remove cards from the top of your library from the game..." So I'm thinking you won't get the +4/+4 when cascading since you aren't really drawing. Is this correct or not?
